Artificial Intelligence (AI) refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are designed to think and act like humans. These machines are programmed to learn from experience, recognize patterns, make decisions, and solve problems in ways that mimic the human mind. AI systems can be trained to perform tasks such as image and speech recognition, natural language processing, and decision-making. FYI, I'm using natural language processing.
